title: Photo-document Project Progress
description: A project engineer needs to take weekly progress photos from established photo points around the site.

tasks.description: Retrieve the list of established photo documentation points for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a map with 8 designated photo locations.

tasks.description: Capture a photo from 'Photo Point #1' and tag it with the location and date.
tasks.expected_outcome: A photo is taken and correctly tagged with metadata.

tasks.description: Upload the tagged photo to the project's photo archive.
tasks.expected_outcome: The photo is successfully stored in the correct folder in the project's document management system.
